item.description: Bad model of DataNode and EditorSupport in XML- and DTD- DataObject.
Class org.netbeans.modules.xml.core.text.TextEditorSupport should extend CloneableEditorSupport instead of DataEditorSupport which is associated with DataObject.

item.summary: XML- and DTD- DataObject and XMLDataObjectLook
item.description: Clear XML- and DTD- DataObject and XMLDataObjectLook, use cookies model mainly.
We could create 'xml-api' module which will specify API for other xml module; 'xml-core' will implement xml-api. See API & Module Versioning Policy -- org.netbeans.modules.xml.[core.api|api].
XML- and DTD- DataLoader could have common super-class.
